task_list.details: Load the dataset from a CSV file into a Pandas DataFrame.
task_list.output: A Pandas DataFrame containing the data.
task_list.assumptions: Assume the data is stored in a file named 'data.csv' in the current working directory.

task_list.task_name: Replace missing values in MedInc with the mean
task_list.details: Identify missing values (e.g., NaN) in the 'MedInc' column and replace them with the mean value of the 'MedInc' column.
task_list.output: DataFrame with missing 'MedInc' values replaced by the mean.
task_list.assumptions: Assume missing values are represented as NaN. There may be missing values in 'MedInc' only.

task_list.task_name: Standardize the AveOccup column using z-scores
task_list.details: Calculate the mean and standard deviation of the 'AveOccup' column and transform each value by subtracting the mean and dividing by the standard deviation (z-score standardization).
task_list.output: DataFrame with a standardized 'AveOccup' column (replacing the original values with z-scores).
task_list.assumptions: Assume the 'AveOccup' column has valid numeric values and no missing data.

task_list.details: Create a new column 'RoomsPerPerson' by dividing the values in the 'AveRooms' column by the values in the 'Population' column for each row.
task_list.assumptions: Assume 'Population' does not contain zeros to avoid division by zero errors.

task_list.task_name: Calculate Pearson correlation between MedianHouseValue and RoomsPerPerson
task_list.details: Compute the Pearson correlation coefficient between the 'MedianHouseValue' and 'RoomsPerPerson' columns.
task_list.output: Pearson correlation coefficient value between 'MedianHouseValue' and 'RoomsPerPerson'.
task_list.assumptions: Assume both columns contain valid numeric values and no missing data.

task_list.task_name: Calculate mean and standard deviation of MedianHouseValue
task_list.details: Calculate and report the mean and standard deviation of the 'MedianHouseValue' column.
task_list.dependencies: Loaded DataFrame (original, as preprocessing does not affect this column)
task_list.output: Mean and standard deviation values of the 'MedianHouseValue' column.
